abstract: The product ID for the device.
overview:
## Discussion

The product ID combines with [doc://com.apple.CoreHID/documentation/CoreHID/HIDVirtualDevice/Properties/vendorID] to specify the exact product. Without knowing the vendor, product ID is useless. Look for vendor specific documentation for more details on the assigned product IDs for their products.

# productID

**Instance Property**

The product ID for the device.

## Declaration

```swift
let productID: UInt32?
```

## Discussion

The product ID combines with [doc://com.apple.CoreHID/documentation/CoreHID/HIDVirtualDevice/Properties/vendorID] to specify the exact product. Without knowing the vendor, product ID is useless. Look for vendor specific documentation for more details on the assigned product IDs for their products.
title: productID
